title: BRIEF-Wisetech Global Responds To Misinformation In Market
text:
BRIEF-Wisetech Global Responds To Misinformation In Market

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 18, 2019 19:28)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Wisetech Global Responds To Misinformation In Market Oct 18 (Reuters) - WiseTech Global Ltd : * WTC RESPONDS TO MISINFORMATION IN MARKET * REJECTS ENTIRELY ALLEGATIONS OF FINANCIAL IMPROPRIETY AND IRREGULARITY CONTAINED IN DOCUMENT * REPORT CONTAINS MANY CLAIMS AND ALLEGATIONS THAT ARE UNTRUE * REPORT WAS PUBLISHED WITHOUT PRIOR INQUIRY TO WISETECH. * SUPPORT INVESTIGATIONS BY AUSTRALIAN REGULATORS OF ATTEMPTS BY OVERSEAS DOMICILED SHORT SELLERS TO TARGET ASX COMPANIES * NO OVERSTATEMENT OF PROFIT, GROWTH OR REVENUE: ACCOUNTS ACCURATE AND NOT INFLATED THROUGH ACQUISITION ACCOUNTING * JCAP ESTIMATES FOR ORGANIC REVENUE GROWTH OF 10% IN FY19 ARE INCORRECT

BRIEF-Wisetech Global Responds To Misinformation In Market
description: BRIEF-Wisetech Global Responds To Misinformation In Market
